snippet: Ms. Merkel offered sympathy to Greeks for their economic suffering, yet insisted on more austerity and no end to the policies that created the calamity.
abstract: Editorial criticizes German Chancellor Angela Merkel for offering sympathy to Greeks for their economic suffering on her visit to the country while insisting that more austerity measures will help its economic situation; contends austerity policies have crippled Greek economy; warns that without wiser German leadership, future of euro and European Union looks increasingly bleak.
lead_paragraph: Ms. Merkel offered sympathy to Greeks for their economic suffering, yet insisted on more austerity and no end to the policies that created the calamity.
